subject: Respond for your loan approval
body:
Dear Home-0wner,

Are you still paying too much for your current mortgage?  Refinance with us 4 lower rate.  You are approved!

You can receive $258,000 for
$751 per month save 41%.

Please submit Right Now.
http://ilook.tw/4ego7

Joseph Jordan
New Lenders 


"Friendship, like the immortality of the soul, is too good to be believed. When friendships are real, they are not glass threads or frost work, but the solidest things we know." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson
